title: (39213) Arroyo -
description: Quiet place on lake Embalse del Ebro, follow the road right after the bridge on the south side and take the right hand gravel track as it splits off. lake is low at the moment but plenty of space. semi wild horses roam free. take your rubbish home and pick some plastic up along the shore line as there is plenty. Some fishermen caught fish while we where here. Not suitable for motorhomes.

title: (39212) Argüeso - 84 Poblado Argueso
description: Argueso, a flat town with a castle and a Cantabrian town that is worth seeing. To the castle you can go up to the parking lot with the AC, you can go with children, you don't have to walk far. visit 3 euros children and 5 adults. the point that we have indicated is below where the road to the Cantabrian town leaves, you can visit it, same price, pay in cash, you have to walk 1km from where the AC leaves, a pleasant walk to go with children, next to a stream and cows We spent the day, but I don't think there would be a problem sleeping. I put a photo of the town where you can park and there is also a park with swings.

title: (39212) Argüeso - 1 Poblado Argueso
description:
Parking simply to visit the castle of Argueso and spend the night. There are two picnic tables with no shade. No services. The town is close.
They are currently sleeping here, since in the town it is not comfortable for the neighbors. They prefer that we sleep here, at the foot of the castle.

title: (39292) Orzales - 9 Diseminado Orzales
description: Beautiful place next to the Orzales pier, the esplanade is next to the farm of a house under construction, with views of the pier and the mountain range. There is also a mill that can be visited (we do not know hours or if it has a cost) Perfect for parking during the day, and very quiet to spend the night at night. even if there are lucky dinners with horses and cows around. The owners of the house were present and at no time did they tell us that they could not spend the night, on the contrary, they said good night and good morning :)

title: (39213) Fombellida - N-611

Very quiet as quite a distance from the cafe, and road too far above to hear. Early morning hunters meet so expect noise early on weekends. Extremely cold in winter as about 800+ metres up!

title: (39491) San Miguel de Aguayo - CA-716

Now at Christmas without problem.

name: Camping

title: (34829) Brañosera - PP-2203

title: (39430) Molledo - 0 Calle García Lomas

title: (34829) Cillamayor - 4 Calle Marisol Cill
description: Hello good village very quiet is this very comfortable parking is a square at 400 meters there is a bakery, black pudding factory there is a bar, and there is a feve station very close. People are always in good vibes a warm greeting

description: Ample parking in the sanctuary of Carmen, where the path of the sculptor Ursi passes. Shaded recreation area and a couple of picnic tables. There is the inn with accommodation and small bar. Very quiet area with hardly any tourism. We have only eaten.

title: (39518) Los Tojos - 67A Poblado los Tojos

title: (39210) - Barrio Brañavieja

title: (39518) Los Tojos - 4 Diseminado los Tojos
description: Picnic place, before barcena mayor or gorse

description: easy access to the marsh. There is electricity and water for a fee, but it didn't work during our stay. room for about 10 vehicles

description:
Nice place,
To eat there is a restaurant that we ate very well.

kid's play zone.

title: (34828) Bustillo de Santullán - 29 Bustillo de Santullán
title_short: (34828) Bustillo de Santullán - 29 Bustillo de Santullán
description: Area to park at the end of a street in the town where there is a fountain where the townspeople go to collect water and take walks. A very friendly man told us that we could park there without problems, because the truth is that the place is a bit hidden. It is an area surrounded by trees and with lots of shade. It only accommodates 2 or 3 vans. No services, just a water source. The people of the town are very friendly and welcoming. Just to park online. Level and asphalt ground. A little difficult to maneuver for when you have to get out of it. We were only there for 3 or 4 hours parked, but the townspeople told us that if we wanted we could stay overnight without problems.

title: (39450) Las Fraguas - 65 Calle Collantes
description: Quiet place with children's playground, boulevard, outdoor gym and picnic area to spend a break in the shade off the highway. No services. Restaurant next door.

title_short: (39419) Santa Maria de Valverde - 14 Poblado Santa Maria de Valverde
description: Car park of the cave art interpretation center, there is a fountain, a rubbish bin. a little inclined, with shoes without problem. Starting point to visit the cave churches, very quiet night.

description: recreational area with slide, lawn, benches and barbecues

title_short: (34849) Santa María de Redondo - Calle Mayor Smre
description: Parking for the route of the Del Río Pisuerga source and the copper cave. Quiet place and a little inclined but bearable. the village at 500 m with a single vegetarian restaurant

title: (09572) Burgos - 215 N-232
description: Passage area to eat or rest. It has several tables and a fountain. Also garbage cans.

title: (39407) - 4A Diseminado Villasuso
description: Flat place a little removed from the quiet road but a steep but short access climb. Nice view over the hills.

title: (34813) Pomar de Valdivia - 14 PP-6222
description: Slightly oblique place, (good with wedges) Fantastic 360º panorama, up to Cordillera Cantábrica. Walks for example: To the waterfall, French cave or gorge possible. Absolutely no noise. Also on the way there are natural park possibilities.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - Unnamed Road
description: A beautiful very quiet meadow on the banks of the Aguilar de Campoo reservoir. At the end of a small bumpy road, a wide unpaved path leads from the turning point to this large meadow with scattered trees. The meadow smells lovely, so it's nice to breathe with the wind. In addition, there is no light, so you can see the starry sky beautifully at night on clear nights.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo -
description: Nice place to spend the night. It does not have any type of installation.

title: (39407) - 126 Barrio la Rueda
description: Square in front of the town hall. Empty square at night. Quiet place. There is a fountain.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 36 Avenida Ronda
description: Parking in the old location of the Fontaneda Cookie Factory. Just below the castle and a step away from the center.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 8 Calle Modesto Lafuente
title_short: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 8 Calle Modesto Lafuente
description: Eco-friendly laundry. There are two 20kg and two 20kg washing machines and two 25kg dryers. The machines automatically use detergent and fabric softener, so you don't need to bring your own. Wash cycles are approximately 35-40 minutes depending on weight and program. It's self-service but there's someone you can leave your laundry with and he'll do it for you. It is very helpful. The machines only use coins, but there is a coin exchange machine. There is a separate price list for dry cleaning.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 7 Avenida Cervera
description: Parking next to the monastery. There is a large tree that offers good shade. For ACs of all sizes. Very calm.

title: (34849) San Juan de Redondo -
description: 2 places maxi on the side of the water tower with a view of the mountain range, super quiet ... of course, do not park in front of the door ...

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 4 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking in a dead end round point at the lake with a picnic area. Tables and benches protected from pines, breathtaking views of the lake. Small shelter  with tables and benches. Waste containers. Quiet, full nature. Beach, few joggers in the morning. Beware some branches of low trees if access from the right of the roundabout.

title: (34813) Pomar de Valdivia - 13 PP-6222
description: Parking of the cave of the French. Allowed day and night. Very quiet at the end of the visits. Altiplano with good views not only in the nearby viewpoint.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 4 Avenida Virgen del Llano
title_short: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 4 Avenida Virgen del Llano
description: Parking next to the river, two minutes walk from the center of Aguilar de Campoo, a charming town with lots of charm. Some noise is heard until midnight due to the proximity of the road. There are two supermarkets very close (Día and Lupa) and a very cool walk along the river.

title: (39555) - 1 Lugar Barrio Tudanca
description: Lovely stop. Bread van comes in the morning to the bar/restaurant. Water tap not working. Great food in restaurant. Very friendly.

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoó - 21 Paseo el Soto
title_short: (34800) Aguilar de Campoó - 21 Paseo el Soto
description:
Free municipal aire, full water facilities in good condition. Next to school and sports pitches. Short flat walk along river to town centre. Very pleasant town with castle, monastery, churches, bustling main square and river walks. Tuesday morning market. 

Careful! Sat Nav may try to access via low tunnel. Instead follow signs from town centre (well signposted from roundabout).

title: (34830) Salinas de Pisuerga - 50 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very nice place for parking and overnight. Between trees and next to the canal. Very close picnic area also bars and restaurants in the town. There are a couple of signs indicating the area.

title: (34800) - 62 Diseminado Diseminados
description:
A small carpark set back from the road with a fantastic view of the dam including a viewing platform. 

Some rubbish and toilet paper left around the area which is very sad to see. LEAVE NO TRACE!

title_short: (34830) Salinas de Pisuerga - 22 Plaza de la Serreria

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 80 Diseminado Diseminados

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - 80 Diseminado Diseminados

title: (39407) Villayuso - 3B Diseminado Collado
description: Flat esplanade with a viewpoint, some trees that provide shade. Ideal for eating and even sleeping. Out of all population.

title_short: (39250) La Puente del Valle - 18 Barrio la Puente del Valle

You can enter with our wagons without problem, but be careful if it rains ... there is a source, but it does not work. It is next to the road, next to the bridge towards “Sobrepenilla”. There are several tables, a very large ... also flies, and cows: VIVA CANTABRIA!

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 63 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Clear in the forest very quiet and pleasant, without a single noise and completely alone. Leaving the dam behind, go up the road and take a track to the right. After 50 m, take a path to the right that immediately leads to a clearing.

title: (34810) - 63 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Panoramic views over lake. Trees surrounding. On the end of a peninsular. Very quiet. Go over the dam and up the road, take track on the right. Bit bumpy but lovely and flat at the end. Room to turn also.

title: (34849) Pesaguero - Puerto de Piedrasluengas

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 81 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very quiet place to spend the day, I imagine you can stay overnight but we were only passing, it is very level and access is good

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 81 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very quiet place near the lake. Access a bit tricky, take the small road on the right side at the entrance road. With our Bulli we spent here 2 quiet nights. Lovely village and Dam at a few km. Only Some fisherman in the morning

title: (34813) Revilla de Pomar - 16 Diseminado Diseminados

title: (34800) Aguilar de Campoo - Unnamed Road

title: (34810) Foldada -

title: (39513) Espinilla -

title: (39220) Polientes - 4-142 Barrio Polientes
description: We stayed one night, it is one, close to the city center, close to a supermarket and a bar serving meals. Parking not leveled.

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 119 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Path that leads to the swamp with numerous parking places, you can be in sight or hidden between trees. He sleeps peacefully.

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 133 Diseminado Diseminados

title: (34810) Aguilar de Campoo - 122 Diseminado Diseminados

That's if it's full of shit from the pigs that are going to do it there... It's a bit of a riding school but I already said that being parties as they were nobody showed up there!!

title: (39680) Ontaneda - 137B Barrio Ontaneda
description: ONTANEDA (Ayuntamiento of San Vicente de Toranzo). Address: Calle de Javier de Riancho. New area for campers. Bituminous soil, flat. 30 locations. This area is very recent. An automatic barrier device is in place. The access card can now be purchased from a machine in the middle of the motorhome park. The card reader is the digital keypad at the gate. Just place your card on the keypad and the gate opens.The car park is equipped with 9 electrical terminals each consisting of 4 power outlets. 36 in total. In the center of the area there is a service equipment for Wc cassettes and wastewater. Drinking water tap and tap to rinse the cassettes. At the edge of the area a greenway is present. Small flat: the width between the pillars supporting the barriers is only 3.14 meters. Municipal swimming pool nearby.

title: (39555) Santa Águeda -
description: Place next to a dirt road. Arriving at the top of the mountain, 2000m altitude. You can go up a dirt track (quite well and easy access). There is little shade, but it is very good. Absolute tranquility. We spent the whole day next to cows and horses and spent the night here. The sunset is spectacular and the views are worth it if you are looking for a quiet place.

title: (34815) Gama - 20 Calle San Andrés Gama
description: Perfect place to visit the Gama climbing area.

title_short: (39686) San Pedro del Romeral - 33 Barrio San Pedro

No services in the parking lot, but in the town there is a bar / restaurant and public services, grocery store and typical of the area such as sobaos and meet-ups. Possibility of walking routes, good views of the Pasiegos valleys, natural pools not far away, as well as river areas for bathing, grass soccer field ...

title: (39554) San Sebastián de Garabandal - 8B Barrio San Sebastián de Garabandal
title_short: (39554) San Sebastián de Garabandal - 8B Barrio San Sebastián de Garabandal
description: Roadside parking just before you enter the village of Saint Sebastian de garabandal. Super quiet road even in August. Water taps in the village and a restaurant. Garabandal is famous for the apparitions of the Virgin Mary to 4 girls in 1961. It is a quiet pilgrimage site and worth a visit. The tourist info centre has lots of info.

title: (39685) Vega de Pas - Unnamed Road
